items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The size is true to fit
items.body: True to size very comfortable beautiful dress Read more
items.author: Maria Martin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful color and dress
items.body: This is a really pretty dress with a flattering square neckline and nice flowy style! The smocked top gives it a comfortable fit, and the long sleeves make it perfect for fall. The fabric is lightweight and moves beautifully, but the sleeved have a tendency to slip down. Still, it’s a lovely, easy-to-wear dress that feels feminine and comfortable. Read more
items.author: A Busy Reader

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to Size
items.body: Really cute fall dress and fits perfectly. The material is a little thin, but otherwise the fit is really good and it’s true to the color in the photos. Read more
items.author: Lynn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful
items.body: wonderful weight and comfortable dress Read more
items.author: nancy hall

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
items.body: Way too tight on chest and arms. Nice color. Itchy fabric. Read more
items.author: Ally C

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love this dress so much!! It fits perfect and was great quality. It looked great for fall family photos and I was able to wear it to a fall wedding! Read more
items.author: Kaitlyn Croft

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great in theory. Lacking in execution.
items.body: Ordering clothes online (especially here on the 'Zon) can be an adventure - in large part because it so often feels like a gamble. Sometimes it pays off - other times what you receive misses the mark. This dress is somewhere in the middle of that spectrum for me. First - the positives. The color is true to the photo and it is very beautiful. The overall design of the dress itself is rather nice, too. But there were a few areas where this fell a bit flat for me on a personal level. The material is very thin - like, see-through thin, so you'll definitely want to wear a slip underneath this. The material is also a lot more stiff/scratchy than I had expected. It's not terrible, but it's definitely on the cheaper side. If you're between sizes or have more ample offerings in the chest area, you'll probably want to size up, especially if you want the more draped effect advertised in the picture. I feel like if the manufacturer changed to a softer material with a bit more substance to it, this dress easily would have been a 4.5 for me. Read more
items.author: TM

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin Materials
items.body: Is advertised as a "fall" dress. The only thing "fall" about it is the choice of color. The material is very very thin; so if wearing out make sure to keep this in mind. Read more
items.author: PMW

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown Floral, Purple, Burgundy, Army Green, Black, Rust Red, Emerald Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
